required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Treatment of Early Triple-negative Breast Cancer With Chidamide and Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: Chidamide Combined With Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy in Early Triple-negative Breast Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

clinical_study.source: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Objective to evaluate the efficacy and safety of neoadjuvant therapy with Chidamide combined with chemotherapy for stage II - III triple-negative breast cancer，and to compare the efficacy and safety of chemotherapy with Chidamide and chemotherapy alone in the neoadjuvant treatment of stage II - III triple-negative breast cancer

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy Outcome: pathologic complete response（pCR） rate（ypT0/is ypN0）
primary_outcome.description: pCR defined as no invasive tumour residuals in breast and no invasive and no non-invasive tumour residuals in axillary lymph nodes (ypT0/is ypN0) after neoadjuvant therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Objective Response Rate (ORR) by RECIST v1.1
secondary_outcome.description: Objective Response Rate (ORR) by RECIST v1.1
response by other pCR definitions（ypT0 ypN0; ypT0 ypN0/+;ypT0/is ypN0/+; ypT[any] ypN0）

arm_group.description: Chidamide, orally,20mg at day 0,4,7,11,21,every 3 weeks; in combination with Docetaxel 75mg/m2,intravenous infusion，at day1 every 3 weeks，and Epirubicin 75mg/m2, intravenous infusion，at day1 every 3 weeks

intervention.description: Chidamide, orally,20mg at day 0,4,7,11,21,every 3 weeks; in combination with Docetaxel 75mg/m2,intravenous infusion，at day1 every 3 weeks，and Epirubicin 75mg/m2, intravenous infusion，at day1 every 3 weeks
intervention.other_name: Other Name: For Chidamide: HBI-8000, CS055
